local_intent: Verify visibility of 'green_bottle'; if not visible, run detection once and verify again.
assumptions: A single re-detection attempt is sufficient to re-establish visibility
No blackboard keys are required by DetectObject or IsObjectVisible
coherence_with_global: Implements the verify step of the global plan. If the bottle is not visible, it re-triggers detection before re-checking visibility, consistent with failure-and-recovery guidance.
